Topic.Title: Publish Games on Game Hosting Sites or Steam

Posts.EditableText:
Hey Guys!

Can I ask a question? Well, I recently downloaded Quest and I might think it could help me to be an _Indie Game Developer_.
But, I am so curious that yeah... You could publish the games on textadventures.co.uk you've been created on Quest.

But, What I want is to Publish games I created on Quest **_ON_** Game Hosting Sites or Either on **Steam**.

Could you tell me How can I make my games created in Quest in _.exe_ format in order to Publish/Sell my Game on Steam or Other Game Hosting Sites. I hope someone answers... Thanks!
Posts.HTML:
Hey Guys!

Can I ask a question? Well, I recently downloaded Quest and I might think it could help me to be an Indie Game Developer.
But, I am so curious that yeah... You could publish the games on textadventures.co.uk you've been created on Quest.

But, What I want is to Publish games I created on Quest ON Game Hosting Sites or Either on Steam.

Could you tell me How can I make my games created in Quest in .exe format in order to Publish/Sell my Game on Steam or Other Game Hosting Sites. I hope someone answers... Thanks!

Posts.EditableText:
No. This isn't possible with quest. This is the main issue with an otherwise awesome program. If you want to reach a wider audience or make any money off the thousands of hours you will spend making a game you will want to use a different program.

 Good luck!
